attributes.additional_details:
#PAP Stands for 'Punish a Paedophile'. No longer should paedophiles be allowed to walk the streets and be given the chance to commit a crime that could seriously endanger anyone mentally or physically.
This petition is to be signed by everyone who agrees with the above statement and wishes for the government to take #PAP seriously, listen to what we want and to adjust the way in which paedophiles in the United Kingdom are dealt with when found guilty of their crimes.
Lets not take the soft approach on paedophiles.
#PAP
